replies.body:
@imryaan 
well first things first, I'm at my last year of high school, plus i sold my soul to a project in our school where we build robots and participate in a competition, you can google FRC, and now that its over i have nothing to do :)

And about the prestiges, oh my god I really want to punch something, first i get to prestige 10 in the before previous update, then i get the omega badge in the omega update, and now all of it is for nothing again :), I'm probably gonna come back to play this XD

@Lokigh
  I have the time the question is if i want to spend it on Ts? ;)
  KbWars ofc
  I'm in my last year of high school rn its 12th grade here :P
  I Major in Chemistry and Physics :P

@Passively 
  Claro que me acuerdo de ti, y todavia sos malo ;) 

@Myv
Read what i wrote to imryaan

@Lythure 
LYTHUREEEEEE come estas conio?
que me olvide de vos? pfff
mi vida esta llendo genial preferiria hablar con ti no en chat para contar te
opiniones de ti no puedo desir porque dios mio ase mucho que no hablamos XD
podes visitar me quando quieras :)
y el final de Fairy Tail la anime o la manga?

@ICHIBAN
Toby read what i wrote to Myv
for future plans im probably gonna try come online more often, and idk try to build myself a better pc :P
as for anime most of them been shitty this year, as for manga i can recommend you Rikudou, i really enjoy it.

@aquaticc
i dont know who you are/ you changed your name maybe?
and im planing on playing again but not as often as i used to xD

@Okiba 
the bird! 
and about horizon it seems like a go.... wtf is wrong with possi?

@xNemoII
ofc i do y do u even ask?
and i still remember that time on castle adventure -.-
